name: Tights [1]
description: The suitable clothes to make you easier to move.

name: Time Keeper's Boots [2]
description: A cloak that guards the time, Player can use it to avoid the travel through the space.

name: Time Keeper's Loop
chineseName: 时间守护者的脚底光圈

name: Time Keeper's Manteau [1]
description: A cloak that guards the time, Player can use it to avoid the pain of being distorted by space.

name: Time Keeper's Manteau [2]
description: A cloak that guards the time, Player can use it to avoid the pain of being distorted by space.

name: Time Observation
description: The glasses used by the time master Talwar are able to see the passage of time and see the shape of life at different times. Don't indulge in it, otherwise you will lose the concept of time!

name: Time Observation Blueprint
description: The glasses used by the time master Talwar are able to see the passage of time and see the shape of life at different times. Don't indulge in it, otherwise you will lose the concept of time!

name: Time Shadow
effect: Def ＋15,When Refining ＋10 and Luck reaches 90, Crit.Dmg ＋5%

name: Time Twister
description: The Clock of Destiny's components are scattered in places where time is stagnant. They contain dangerous energy.

name: Tirfing [2]
description: The sword will bring disasters to the user.

name: Tirfing [3]
description: The sword will bring disasters to the user.

name: Token of Siegfried
description: The token of Siegfried, the immortal god. It's said that anyone carrying this item can overcome death, This item will be consumed so that people can immediately resurrect after death.

name: Tomahawk [1]
description: The horrible axe. When being thrown, it will follow the wind to chase the enemy.
